name: 13QWOP
description:
A Trijam #46 entry (Trijam is a game jam where you're supposed to make a game in 3 hours). I thought I could recreate QWOP in this timespan, with the theme of 13 legs. However, as it turns out, 13-legged physics is not that simple and I was not able to make a fully-fledged QWOP clone in this timespan.

This game was made using the Godot engine.
